title: Grand Opening: Barossa Valley Luxurious Adults-Only Eco-Cabins Steps from Seppeltsfield Winery with Private Sauna
description:
The gateway to the Barossa is opening just for you. Disconnect with the world and connect with nature at CABN X Seppeltsfield Barossa - a unique retreat nestled amid the vineyards of one of Australia's most prestigious wine regions. As an adults-only property, your eco-friendly, off-grid cabin offers a romantic escape boasting a luxe in-cabin private sauna and gas fireplace, fully equipped kitchen and deep soaking bathtub. Perfectly positioned within breathtaking South Australian wine country, each of the four cabins are just a short stroll from the historic Seppeltsfield Estate.

The Barossa is home to some of the oldest vines in Australia, 90 cellar doors, world-class restaurants and just a 60-minute drive from Adelaide. Guests are moments from the outstanding, boutique winery, Hentley Farm, while Nurioopta and Tanunda townships are both 10 minutes' drive away, offering quaint cafes, boutique shops and antique stores.
offer_address: 675 Seppeltsfield Road, Seppeltsfield 5355, South Australia, Australia

title: Barossa Valley Romantic Eco-Cabins near Seppeltsfield Winery with Private Sauna
description: The gateway to the Barossa is opening just for you. Disconnect with the world and escape to wine country at CABN X Seppeltsfield - a unique self-contained retreat nestled amid the vineyards of one of Australia's most prestigious wine regions. Your eco-friendly, off-grid cabin offers a romantic escape, boasting a luxe in-cabin private sauna and gas fireplace - all just a short stroll from the historic Seppeltsfield Estate.
